set.name: The Hobbit - Over Hill and Under Hill

property.name: Text
property.value:
The first player gains control of Bilbo Baggins. Bilbo Baggins cannot gain resources from player card effects.
If Bilbo Baggins leaves play, the players lose the game.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Dwarf. Noble. Warrior.

property.name: Text
property.value: If you control at least 5 Dwarf characters, add 1 additional resource to Thorin Oakenshield's pool when you collect resources during the resource phase.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: After you play a Dwarf character from your hand, reduce your threat by 1.

property.name: Text
property.value: If you control at least 5 Dwarf characters, draw 1 additional card at the beginning of the resource phase.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Beorning. Warrior.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Sentinel. Cannot have attachments.

property.name: Text
property.value:
Immune to player card effects.
Beorn does not exhaust to defend.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: After you play Fili from your hand during the planning phase, search your deck for Kili and put him into play under your control. Then, shuffle your deck.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: After you play Kili from your hand during the planning phase, search your deck for Fili and put him into play under your control. Then, shuffle your deck.

property.name: Text
property.value: Action: Exhaust Bofur to search the top 5 cards of your deck for 1 Weapon attachment. Add that card to your hand and shuffle the other cards back into your deck.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: After a hero is assigned any amount of damage, exhaust Dori to place that damage on Dori instead.

property.name: Text
property.value:
Gandalf does not exhaust to commit to a quest.
Forced: At the end of the refresh phase, discard Gandalf from play. You may raise your threat by 2 to cancel this effect.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Attach to a hero.

property.name: Text
property.value: Action: Discard Cram to ready attached hero.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Attach to a character.

property.name: Text
property.value: Action: Exhaust Spare Hood and Cloak and exhaust attached character to ready another character. Then, attach Spare Hood and Cloak to that character.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Artifact. Item.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Attach to a hero.

property.name: Text
property.value: Travel Action: Exhaust Thrór's Map to choose a location in the staging area. Make that location the active location. (If there is another active location, return it to the staging area.)

property.name: Text
property.value: Action: Exhaust 2 allies you control to shuffle your deck and discard the top 5 cards. Put up to 2 allies discarded by this effect into play under your control. The total cost of the allies put into play cannot exceed the total cost of the allies exhausted to pay for this effect.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: After a hero you control attacks and destroys an enemy, exhaust a Weapon card attached to that hero to draw 3 cards.

property.name: Text
property.value: Combat Action: Exhaust a Weapon card attached to a hero you control to choose an enemy engaged with you. Deal 2 damage to that enemy. (Deal 3 damage instead if the enemy is an Orc.)

property.name: Text
property.value: Quest Action: Exhaust a character you control that is not committed to the quest to commit that character to the quest.

property.name: Text
property.value:
Play during the quest phase, before the staging step.
Action: Deal 2 damage to the first enemy revealed from the encounter deck this phase.

property.name: Text
property.value: Action: Bilbo Baggins gets +2 Ò, +2 Û, and +2 Ú until the end of the phase. (You may spend a Í resource from Bilbo Baggins' resource pool to play this card even if you do not control Bilbo Baggins.)

property.name: Traits
property.value: Artifact. Item. Weapon.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Attach to Bilbo Baggins. Restricted.

property.name: Text
property.value:
Bilbo Baggins gets +1 Ò, +1 Û, and +1 Ú.
Response: After Bilbo Baggins exhausts to defend, discard the top card of the encounter deck. Deal damage to the attacking enemy equal to the discarded card's $.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Artifact. Item. Weapon.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Attach to a hero. Restricted.

property.name: Text
property.value:
Attached character gets +2 Û.
Response: After attached hero destroys an Orc enemy, add 1 resource to that hero's resource pool.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Artifact. Item. Weapon.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Attach to a hero or Gandalf. Restricted.

property.name: Text
property.value:
Attached character gets +2 Û.
Response: After attached character destroys an Orc enemy, draw 1 card.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: We Must Away, Ere Break of Day

property.name: Text
property.value: Setup: Remove and shuffle the 7 Sack cards into a Sack deck and set it aside face down. Remove the 3 Troll enemies and the Troll Cave from the encounter deck and set them aside out of play. Then, shuffle the encounter deck. Each player reveals 1 card from the top of the encounter deck and adds it to the staging area.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: We Must Away, Ere Break of Day

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: We Must Away, Ere Break of Day

property.name: Text
property.value: When Revealed: Add the set-aside Troll enemies and the Troll Cave to the staging area. Shuffle the encounter discard pile back into the encounter deck.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: We Must Away, Ere Break of Day

property.name: Text
property.value:
Forced: If there are no Troll enemies left in play, or if there are no cards left in the encounter deck, advance to the next stage.
Any time players would place progress tokens on this quest, discard an equal number of cards from the encounter deck instead. (Progress is placed on the active location before triggering this effect.)

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: We Must Away, Ere Break of Day

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: We Must Away, Ere Break of Day

property.name: Text
property.value:
When Revealed: Remove all Troll enemies and Sack cards from the game. If Troll Cave is in the victory display, the players have discovered the treasure cards Sting, Glamdring, and Orcrist.
The players have won the game.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: Over the Misty Mountains Grim

property.name: Text
property.value: Setup: Shuffle the Over the Misty Mountains Grim and Western Lands encounter sets into one encounter deck and make it the active encounter deck. Then, shuffle the The Great Goblin and Misty Mountain Goblins encounter sets into a second encounter deck and set it aside, inactive.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: Over the Misty Mountains Grim

property.name: Text
property.value: When Revealed: Each player may search his deck for 1 treasure card and add it to his hand, then shuffle his deck. Advance to stage 2A.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: Over the Misty Mountains Grim

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: Over the Misty Mountains Grim

property.name: Text
property.value: When Revealed: Search the encounter deck for 1 copy of Stone-giant and add it to the staging area. Then, shuffle the encounter deck. Reveal 1 card per player from the encounter deck and add it to the staging area.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: The Great Goblin

property.name: Text
property.value: When Revealed: Shuffle all encounter cards back into the encounter deck and set it aside, inactive. The second encounter deck becomes the active encounter deck. Search the encounter deck for The Great Goblin and add it to the staging area. Then, shuffle the encounter deck.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: The Great Goblin

property.name: Text
property.value:
Players cannot defeat this stage unless The Great Goblin is in the victory display.
When Revealed: Reveal 3 encounter cards per player. Bilbo Baggins may spend X resources to reduce the total number of encounter cards revealed by X. (To a minimum of 1.)
If the players defeat this stage, they have won the game.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: Dungeons Deep and Caverns Dim

property.name: Text
property.value: Setup: Add Lake in the Cavern to the staging area. Create a riddle area with stage 2A and follow the setup instructions on that card.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: Dungeons Deep and Caverns Dim

property.name: Text
property.value:
Players cannot advance to stage 3A unless both 1B and 2B are complete.
Forced: Reveal 1 additional encounter card per player during the staging step.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: Dungeons Deep and Caverns Dim

property.name: Text
property.value: Setup: Search the encounter deck for Gollum and Bilbo's Magic Ring. Place Gollum and Bilbo Baggins in the riddle area and attach Bilbo's Magic Ring to Bilbo Baggins. Then, shuffle the encounter deck.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: Dungeons Deep and Caverns Dim

property.name: Text
property.value:
Players cannot advance to stage 3A unless both 1B and 2B are complete.
Progress tokens cannot be added to, or removed from, this quest except by answering riddles.
Cards in the riddle area are immune to player card effects and cannot leave the riddle area except by quest effects.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: Dungeons Deep and Caverns Dim

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: Dungeons Deep and Caverns Dim

property.name: Text
property.value:
When Revealed: The first player gains control of Bilbo Baggins. Reveal 1 encounter card per player and add it to the staging area.
Gollum engages the first player. Damage from undefended attacks made by Gollum must be placed on Bilbo Baggins.
All riddle effects are ignored. Treachery cards gain surge.
If the players defeat this stage, they have won the game.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: We Must Away, Ere Break of Day

property.name: Text
property.value:
Troll enemies not engaged with a player cannot take damage.
Forced: After William engages a player, sack 2.
Forced: Return William to the staging area at the end of the combat phase. The engaged player may raise his threat by 1 to cancel this effect.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: We Must Away, Ere Break of Day

property.name: Text
property.value:
Players cannot play attachment cards on Troll enemies.
Forced: After Bert engages a player, sack 1.
Forced: Return Bert to the staging area at the end of the combat phase. The engaged player may raise his threat by 1 to cancel this effect.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: We Must Away, Ere Break of Day

property.name: Text
property.value:
Troll enemies can only be attacked by one character at a time.
Forced: After Tom engages a player, sack 1.
Forced: Return Tom to the staging area at the end of the combat phase. The engaged player may raise his threat by 1 to cancel this effect.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: Western Lands

property.name: Text
property.value: When Revealed: Reveal the top card of the encounter discard pile and add it to the staging area, if able.

property.name: Shadow
property.value: Shadow: If this attack deals at least 1 damage, shuffle this card back into the encounter deck.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: We Must Away, Ere Break of Day

property.name: Traits
property.value: Forest. Trollshaws.

property.name: Text
property.value:
While Troll Camp is in the staging area, Troll enemies get +1 $ for each player in the game.
While Troll Camp is in play, Bilbo Baggins gains: "Action: Exhaust Bilbo Baggins and spend 1 Í resource to remove 1 Sack card from a character. Bilbo Baggins may trigger this effect even with a Sack card attached to him."

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: We Must Away, Ere Break of Day

property.name: Traits
property.value: Cave. Trollshaws.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Immune to player card effects.

property.name: Text
property.value: Players cannot travel to Troll Cave unless Bilbo Baggins has the Troll Key attached and the first player spends 5 Í resources. (2 Í resources instead if Bilbo Baggins has the Troll Purse attached.)

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: We Must Away, Ere Break of Day

property.name: Traits
property.value: Western Lands.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: After placing 1 or more progress tokens on Hobbit-lands, the first player draws 1 card.

property.name: Shadow
property.value: Shadow: Defending player must put the top card of the encounter deck discard pile on top of the encounter deck.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: Western Lands

property.name: Traits
property.value: Western Lands.

property.name: Text
property.value:
Forced: After placing 1 or more progress tokens on Dreary Hills, each player must discard 1 card at random from his hand.
Response: After Dreary Hills leaves play as an explored location, Bilbo Baggins gains 1 resource.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: Western Lands

property.name: Traits
property.value: Western Lands.

property.name: Text
property.value:
Forced: After placing 1 or more progress tokens on Lone-Lands, each player removes 1 resource from one of his hero's resource pools, if able.
Response: After Lone-Lands leaves play as an explored location, Bilbo Baggins gains 1 resource.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: Western Lands

property.name: Traits
property.value: Western Lands.

property.name: Text
property.value: While Cave Entrance is in the staging area, it gains: "Forced: At the end of the round, place the top X cards of the encounter discard pile on the bottom of the encounter deck. X is the number of players in the game."

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: We Must Away, Ere Break of Day

property.name: Text
property.value:
If Troll Purse is discarded, add it to the staging area. If Troll Purse is unattached and in the staging area, attach it to a Troll enemy, if able.
Response: After attached Troll enemy is destroyed, the first player may spend 1 Í resource to claim this objective and attach it to Bilbo Baggins.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: We Must Away, Ere Break of Day

property.name: Text
property.value:
If Troll Key is discarded, add it to the staging area. If Troll Key is unattached and in the staging area, attach it to a Troll enemy, if able.
Response: After attached Troll enemy takes damage as the result of an attack, the first player may exhaust Bilbo Baggins to claim this objective and attach it to him.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: We Must Away, Ere Break of Day

property.name: Text
property.value:
When Sacked: Attach to the ally (excluding Gandalf) with the highest printed cost without a Sack attached.
Attached character cannot ready, attack, defend, commit to quests, or trigger effects. If this Sack card is removed, shuffle it into the sack deck.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: We Must Away, Ere Break of Day

property.name: Text
property.value:
When Sacked: Attach to the character (excluding Gandalf) with the highest printed Û without a Sack attached.
Attached character cannot ready, attack, defend, commit to quests, or trigger effects. If this Sack card is removed, shuffle it into the sack deck.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: We Must Away, Ere Break of Day

property.name: Text
property.value:
When Sacked: Attach to the character (excluding Gandalf) with the highest printed Ú without a Sack attached.
Attached character cannot ready, attack, defend, commit to quests, or trigger effects. If this Sack card is removed, shuffle it into the sack deck.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: We Must Away, Ere Break of Day

property.name: Text
property.value:
When Sacked: Attach to the character (excluding Gandalf) with the highest printed hit points without a Sack attached.
Attached character cannot ready, attack, defend, commit to quests, or trigger effects. If this Sack card is removed, shuffle it into the sack deck.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: We Must Away, Ere Break of Day

property.name: Text
property.value:
When Sacked: Attach to the character (excluding Gandalf) with the highest printed Ò without a Sack attached.
Attached character cannot ready, attack, defend, commit to quests, or trigger effects. If this Sack card is removed, shuffle it into the sack deck.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: We Must Away, Ere Break of Day

property.name: Text
property.value:
When Sacked: Attach to the character (excluding Gandalf) with the most attachments without a Sack attached.
Attached character cannot ready, attack, defend, commit to quests, or trigger effects. If this Sack card is removed, shuffle it into the sack deck.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: We Must Away, Ere Break of Day

property.name: Text
property.value:
When Sacked: Attach to hero with the most resources without a Sack attached.
Attached character cannot ready, attack, defend, commit to quests, or trigger effects. If this Sack card is removed, shuffle it into the sack deck.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: We Must Away, Ere Break of Day

property.name: Text
property.value: When Revealed: If there is a Troll enemy in the staging area, Sack 1. If there are no Troll enemies in the staging area, this card gains Doomed 2.

property.name: Shadow
property.value: Shadow: If the attacking enemy is a Troll, Sack 1. (The first player may spend 1 Í resource to cancel this effect.)

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: We Must Away, Ere Break of Day

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Doomed 1.

property.name: Text
property.value: When Revealed: Place the top X cards of the encounter discard pile on the bottom of the encounter deck. X is equal to twice the number of players in the game.

property.name: Shadow
property.value: Shadow: Shuffle this card into the encounter deck.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: We Must Away, Ere Break of Day

property.name: Text
property.value: When Revealed: Deal 1 damage to each ally. (2 damage instead if there is a Troll enemy in the staging area.)

property.name: Shadow
property.value: Shadow: Search the encounter deck for Troll Camp and add it to the staging area. Then, shuffle the encounter deck.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: We Must Away, Ere Break of Day

property.name: Text
property.value: When Revealed: The first player chooses a Troll enemy in the staging area and engages that enemy. If there are no Troll enemies in the staging area, this card gains Surge.

property.name: Shadow
property.value: Shadow: Deal 4 damage to each character with a Sack card attached. (The first player may spend 2 Í resources to cancel this effect.)

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: Western Lands

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Doomed 1.

property.name: Text
property.value: When Revealed: Each player must choose one: increase his threat by 4, or reveal an additional encounter card from the encounter deck and add it to the staging area.

property.name: Shadow
property.value: Shadow: The defending player raises his threat by 2.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: Western Lands

property.name: Text
property.value: When Revealed: Discard all non-treasure, non-objective attachments in play.

property.name: Shadow
property.value: Shadow: The defending character gets -1 Ú.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: Western Lands

property.name: Text
property.value: When Revealed: Discard all Í resources.

property.name: Shadow
property.value: Shadow: Resolve this card's "When Revealed" effect.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: Misty Mountain Goblins

property.name: Traits
property.value: Goblin. Orc.

property.name: Text
property.value: Goblin Axeman gets +1 Û for each Cave location in play.

property.name: Shadow
property.value: Shadow: Defending character gets -1 Ú.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: Misty Mountain Goblins

property.name: Traits
property.value: Goblin. Orc.

property.name: Text
property.value: Goblin Miners gets +1 Ú for each Cave location in play.

property.name: Shadow
property.value: Shadow: attacking enemy gets +1 Û.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: Misty Mountain Goblins

property.name: Traits
property.value: Goblin. Orc.

property.name: Shadow
property.value: Shadow: attacking enemy makes an additional attack immediately after this one. (Deal a new shadow card for that attack.)

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: Misty Mountain Goblins

property.name: Traits
property.value: Goblin. Orc.

property.name: Text
property.value: When Revealed: The first player exhausts 1 character he controls.

property.name: Shadow
property.value: Shadow: Defending player exhausts 1 character he controls.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: The Great Goblin

property.name: Traits
property.value: Goblin. Orc.

property.name: Text
property.value: If The Great Goblin is in the victory display, this card gains surge.

property.name: Shadow
property.value: Shadow: attacking enemy gets +1 Û. (+2 Û instead if The Great Goblin is in the victory display.)

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: The Great Goblin

property.name: Traits
property.value: Goblin. Orc.

property.name: Text
property.value: Forced: After The Great Goblin attacks, discard X cards from the encounter deck where X is the number of players in the game. Add each Goblin enemy discarded by this effect to the staging area.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: Over the Misty Mountains Grim

property.name: Text
property.value:
While at least one Stone-Giant is in the staging area, the Galloping Boulders card gains surge.
Forced: After Stone-Giant engages a player, that player chooses and discards 1 ally he controls.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: Misty Mountain Goblins

property.name: Text
property.value: While The Goblins' Caves is the active location, Goblin enemies get +1 $.

property.name: Shadow
property.value: Shadow: Defending player raises his threat by X. X is the number of Goblin enemies engaged with him.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: The Great Goblin

property.name: Text
property.value:
While Front Porch is the active location, players cannot attack Goblin enemies.
Action: The first player may spend 2 Í resources to treat Front Porch's printed text box as if it were blank until the end of the round.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: The Great Goblin

property.name: Text
property.value:
While Great Cavern Room is the active location, it gains: "Forced: After a player engages a Goblin enemy, he must deal 1 damage to a character he controls."
Forced: When faced with the option to travel, if The Great Goblin is in the victory display the players must travel to Great Cavern Room if able.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: Over the Misty Mountains Grim

property.name: Text
property.value: While Overhanging Rock is the active location, it gains: "Action: Spend 1 Í resource to look at the top 2 cards of your deck. Add 1 of those to your hand and discard the other."

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: Over the Misty Mountains Grim

property.name: Text
property.value:
X is the number of players in the game.
Forced: At the end of the round, remove X progress tokens from the current quest.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: Misty Mountain Goblins

property.name: Text
property.value: When Revealed: Starting with the first player, each player must choose 1 Goblin enemy from the discard pile and add it to the staging area.

property.name: Shadow
property.value: Shadow: Defending player deals damage among characters he controls equal to the number of Goblin enemies engaged with him.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: The Great Goblin

property.name: Text
property.value: When Revealed: All engaged enemies return to the staging area. Then, each Goblin enemy gets +1 $ until the end of the phase.

property.name: Shadow
property.value: Shadow: attacking enemy is returned to the staging area after its attack resolves.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: Over the Misty Mountains Grim

property.name: Text
property.value: When Revealed: The first player chooses a questing character. That character takes 3 damage and is removed from the quest.

property.name: Shadow
property.value: Shadow: Put this card on top of the encounter deck.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: Over the Misty Mountains Grim

property.name: Text
property.value: When Revealed: The first player chooses 1 Stone-giant in the staging area. At the end of the quest phase, that Stone-giant engages the player with the highest threat. If there are no Stone-giant cards in the staging area, search the encounter deck for 1 Stone-giant and add it to the staging area.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: Dungeons Deep and Caverns Dim

property.name: Text
property.value: Forced: After the first player answers a riddle and fails to find at least 1 match, Gollum attacks Bilbo Baggins. (Do not deal a shadow card for this attack.)

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: Dungeons Deep and Caverns Dim

property.name: Text
property.value:
Forced: If Great Gray Wolf is dealt a shadow card with a riddle, return all Creature enemies to the staging area at the end of the combat phase.
Riddle: The first player names a card type, sphere and cost, shuffles his deck, then discards the top 3 cards. For each of those cards that matches all three items, place 1 progress token on stage 2.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: Dungeons Deep and Caverns Dim

property.name: Text
property.value:
Forced: If Wild Wargs is dealt a shadow card with a riddle, it gets +2 Û.
Riddle: The first player names a card type, shuffles his deck, and discards the top 2 cards. For each of those cards that matches, place 1 progress token on stage 2.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: Dungeons Deep and Caverns Dim

property.name: Text
property.value:
Forced: After a character takes damage from an attack made by a Creature enemy, remove 1 progress from the current quest.
Riddle: The first player names a sphere, shuffles his deck, and discards the top card. For each of those cards that matches, place 1 progress token on stage 2.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: Dungeons Deep and Caverns Dim

property.name: Keywords
property.value: X is twice the number of players in the game.

property.name: Text
property.value:
Players cannot travel here.
Immune to player card effects.
Forced: After players advance to stage 3, remove Lake in the Cavern from the game.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: Dungeons Deep and Caverns Dim

property.name: Traits
property.value: Artifact. Ring.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Attach to Bilbo Baggins.

property.name: Text
property.value:
Action: When answering a riddle, spend 1 Í resource to discard an additional player card from the top of your deck.
Action: Exhaust Bilbo's Magic Ring and raise each player's threat by 2 to add 1 Í resource to Bilbo Baggins' resource pool.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: Dungeons Deep and Caverns Dim

property.name: Text
property.value:
When Revealed: Starting with the first player, each player must search the encounter deck and encounter discard pile for 1 Creature enemy and put it into play engaged with him. Then, shuffle the encounter deck.
Riddle: The first player names a card type and cost, shuffles his deck, then discards the top 3 cards. For each of those cards that matches both items, place 1 progress token on stage 2.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: Dungeons Deep and Caverns Dim

property.name: Text
property.value:
When Revealed: The first player must choose to answer the riddle on this card. If he finds at least 1 match, discard cards from the encounter deck until another card with a riddle is discarded. Then, answer that riddle.
Riddle: The first player names a cost, shuffles his deck, then discards the top 2 cards. For each of those cards that matches, place 1 progress token on stage 2.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: Dungeons Deep and Caverns Dim

property.name: Text
property.value:
When Revealed: Characters get -1 Ò and cannot attack until the end of the round.
Riddle: The first player names a card type and sphere, shuffles his deck, then discards the top 3 cards. For each of those cards that matches both items, place 1 progress token on stage 2.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: Dungeons Deep and Caverns Dim

property.name: Text
property.value:
When Revealed: The first player must choose to answer the riddle on this card. This effect cannot be canceled.
Riddle: The first player names a sphere and cost, shuffles his deck, then discards the top 2 cards. For each of those cards that matches both items, place 1 progress token on stage 2.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: Dungeons Deep and Caverns Dim

property.name: Text
property.value: When Revealed: The first player names a card type and then discards the top 3 cards of the encounter deck. For each of those cards that does not match the named type, remove 1 progress token from stage 2. This effect cannot be canceled.
